description:
Season: 27
Original Air Date: 9/19/2014

Wyatt pleads with Hope to not allow Quinn’s devious actions in Paris affect their marriage and future together.  Quinn taunts Liam that Wyatt and Hope are working on getting past this minor wrinkle in their relationship.  Liam threatens Quinn that he will do everything in his power to make sure that she is, one day, locked up for her transgressions.  Brooke and Deacon learn that Quinn was behind Hope and Wyatt getting married in Monte Carlo.
